TemplateConfiguration._Description: Creates a new MSBuild source package script for DNN extension.

TemplateFiles.File:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Project xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/developer/msbuild/2003" ToolsVersion="4.0" DefaultTargets="MakeSourcePackage"> <Target Name="MakeSourcePackage" Condition=" '$(Configuration)|$(Platform)' == 'Release|AnyCPU' "> <!-- Read package version from the manifest --> <XmlRead Prefix="n" Namespace="http://schemas.microsoft.com/developer/msbuild/2003" XPath="/dotnetnuke/packages/package[1]/@version" XmlFileName="..\${SolutionName}\${SolutionName}.dnn"> <Output TaskParameter="Value" PropertyName="Version" /> </XmlRead>
<!-- Declare included source files --> <ItemGroup> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.ascx" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.aspx" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.asmx" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.ashx" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.resx" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.css" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.less" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.html" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.htm" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.xml" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.xsl" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.xslt" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.resx" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.js" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.jpg" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.png" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.gif" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.csproj" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.vbproj" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.mdproj" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.targets" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.cs" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.vb" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.sln" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.sqldataprovider" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.dnn" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.txt" /> <SourceIncludeFiles Include="..\**\*.md" /> </ItemGroup>
<!-- Declare excluded files --> <ItemGroup> <SourceExcludeFiles Include="..\**\bin\**" /> <SourceExcludeFiles Include="..\**\obj\**" /> <SourceExcludeFiles Include="..\**\.git\**" /> <SourceExcludeFiles Include="..\**\.svn\**" /> <SourceExcludeFiles Include="..\**\_ReSharper*\**" /> </ItemGroup>
<!-- Apply excluded files filter --> <ItemGroup> <SourceIncludeFilteredFiles Include="@(SourceIncludeFiles)" Exclude="@(SourceExcludeFiles)" /> </ItemGroup>
<!-- Copy filtered source files --> <Copy SourceFiles="@(SourceIncludeFilteredFiles)" DestinationFolder="$(MSBuildProjectDirectory)\tmp_Package\%(RecursiveDir)" />
<!-- Declare source package files --> <ItemGroup> <SourcePackageFiles Include="$(MSBuildProjectDirectory)\tmp_Package\**\*.*" /> </ItemGroup>
<!-- Create the source package --> <Zip Files="@(SourcePackageFiles)" WorkingDirectory="$(MSBuildProjectDirectory)\tmp_Package" ZipFileName="$(PackageName)-$(Version)-Source.$(PackageExtension)" />
<!-- Copy the source package to the output directory --> <Move SourceFiles="$(MSBuildProjectDirectory)\$(PackageName)-$(Version)-Source.$(PackageExtension)" DestinationFolder="$(PackageOutputPath)/" />
<!-- Cleanup --> <RemoveDir Directories="$(MSBuildProjectDirectory)\tmp_Package" />
</Target> </Project>
